frameDefinitions: A Protagonist has become aware of a possible Danger (a dangerous event or a Dangerous_entity that might participate in an event harmful to the Protagonist) and is ready to engage in an Activity in response to that Danger.
A Cognizer decides upon the Chosen (either an item or a course of action) out of a set of  Possibilities .
A Lessee gains the use of Goods owned by a Lessor by payment to the Lessor.
A Gatherer removes Crop ripe and ready to an accepted degree.

An individual or group, the Patrol moves through and examines a Ground in order to ensure that it is in a generally Desired_state_of_affairs, particularly that it is safe and contains no dangerous Unwanted_entity.
A Grower endeavors to tend to and influence the environment of Food so as to foster its growth.
frameExamples: All tropps are on high <t>alert</t> for possible intruders following an attack on a nearby compound.
The council <t>picked</t> you out of all the pilots available to head this mission.
We are <t>renting</t> our apartment from a kind man named Tom.
They <t>harvest</t> their pumpkins in the Autumn. INI
Detective Jones <t>patrolled</t> the northern half of the building.
listRoleDefinitions: This role identifies the <fen>Protagonist</fen> who is prepared to undertake some action in response to a <fen>Danger</fen>.
The action that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is prepared to do.
A dangerous event or situation which teh <fen>Protagonist</fen> is aware of and is ready to respond to.
An entity of which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is aware and which poses a danger.
The time when the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is on alert to the potential Danger.
The <fen>Cognizer</fen> chooses the <fen>Chosen</fen> out of the <fen>Possibilities</fen>.
<fen>Chosen</fen> identifies the entity or course of action which is selected from among the <fen>Possibilities</fen>.

A <fen>Cognizer</fen> makes a choice from among a set of <fen>Possibilities</fen>. <fen>Possibilities</fen> are commonly expressed via an oblique phrase which indicates the alternative or alternatives, or by a subordinate clause (choosing to do it or choosing not to do it), typically headed by 'whether or 'if'.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> chooses the <fen>Chosen</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the choosing occurs.
The individual that gains temporary use of the <fen>Goods</fen> by paying the <fen>Lessor</fen>
The role <fen>Goods</fen> is an item which is temporarily exchanged for <fen>Money</fen> in a transaction.
When the event occurs.
The location the renting takes place.
The <fen>Gatherer</fen> is the agent gathering the <fen>Crop</fen>.
<fen>Crop</fen> is item being collected together by the <fen>Gatherer</fen>.
The <fex name='Source'>Source</fex> is the ground where the <fex name='Crop'>Crop</fex> is gathered from.
When the <fen>Crop</fen> gathering action occurs.
The greater geographic location where the <fen>Gatherer</fen> gathers his <fen>Crop</fen>.
The person (or group) who inspects the <fen>Ground</fen> to see that it is safe.
The area that the <fen>Patrol</fen> inspects with to ensure its safety.
An entity whose presence would impair the desirability or safety of the <fen>Ground</fen>.
The desired outcome of the patrolling. Normally this constituent is a PP Complement headed by <ment>for</ment>, or a <ment>to</ment>-marked VP Complement.
The desirable state of affairs which the <fen>Patrol</fen> hopes to ensure by visiting <fen>Ground</fen>.
>The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Patrol</fen> examines the <fen>Ground</fen>.
The <fen>Grower</fen> is the agent growing <fen>Food</fen>.

<fex name='Food'>Food</fex> is the item grown by the <fen>Grower</fen>, which can include things not traditionally eaten, like flowers, etc., or items for other consumption-related uses, like medicines, smokables, etc.
When the growing event occurs.
The greater geographic location where the <fen>Grower</fen> grows <fen>Food</fen>.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Troops</fex> are on high alert following a string of bombings downtown.
You should be on alert <fex>to evacuate within 30 minutes of hearing the siren</fex> .
We were all on guard <fex>for possible attempts to sabotage the operation</fex>.
Be on alert <fex>for tigers</fex>.
They're on alert <fex>now</fex> .
<fex>We</fex>have to pick a colour for the living room.
I decided <fex>to give it another try</fex>.
They chose their new guitarist <fex>out of more than 300 auditioners</fex>.
I was n't chosen <fex>in the last round</fex>.
The winner was selected <fex>in the secret meeting room</fex>.
<fex>We</fex> 've been renting from him for years .
I tried to hire <fex>a bicycle</fex> .
I rented the car <fex>right next to the airport</fex> .
<fex>Small growers</fex> can harvest quality crops.
<fex>Tubers</fex> harvested immediately after spraying developed gangrene.
They picked the apples <fex>from the tallest trees</fex>.
<fex>Detective Jones</fex> patrolled the northern half of the building.
Four soldiers with submachine guns patrolled <fex>the room</fex>, and an officer made his rounds at frequent intervals.
Security guards patrolled <fex>for intruders</fex> while the game was in progress.
Patrol all unlit areas <fex>to ensure no one is hiding there</fex>.
All our grounds are regularly patrolled <fex>for safety</fex>.
Officerspoliced the parade grounds <fex>during the Memorial day events.</fex> .
He grew <fex>flowers and potatoes</fex>.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the Italian National Federation of the Knights of Labour
the dawn of the third millennium
